fragment.aboutText: Rich Boy Mafia Independent Record Label equips professional artists with every element needed to thrive in the music industry. We have the most accomplished audio engineers, photographers and videographers in Austin.
fragment.artistText: Born and Raised in The Live Music Capitol of the World ; Austin, Texas Scotty Jamz is one of the most multifaceted artists in hiphop. Labeled as the “Hardest Mexican rapper” in the game , his music unites the essences of Gangsta rap to his hispanic roots. ,  Scotty Jamz has produced some of the most infectious hooks & storytelling rap that draws you in from the first lyric.  SXSW showcase appearances, touring the nation and an appearance at the Alaska Hiphop awards have groomed Scotty to take the world by storm in 2021.
fragment.musicText: Sean Gordon a.k.a 10kgohard_ commands the studio, with melodies that take your ears on a journey making you forget the destination.  Born in Austin, Texas to Jamaican parents, while also spending time in Europe playing professional soccer has stretched his range, allowing him to produce beats for any type of artist. Sean’s most recent beat featured on a track that hit 25k views in its first week.
fragment.videoText:
Professional video editing and post production, motion graphics, sound design, voice over, and mixing, green screen, video
social media and more to visually enhance your creative concepts.
